title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file, the line delimiter used is currently returned from the System.getProperties("line.delimiter") method. However, this may not always align with the user's preference.
EB: The line delimiter for new files should be customizable by the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Use a Unix and Windows workstation to develop a Unix product or program.
2. Create a new file.
3. Notice that the line delimiter used may not match the user's preference.
